pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical Multiple Comparison Procedures // Multiple comparison procedures (MCPs) control the familywise error rate in clinical trials. Graphical MCPs include many commonly used procedures as special cases; see Bretz et al. (2011) doi:10.1002/bimj.201000239, Lu (2016) doi:10.1002/sim.6985, and Xi et al. (2017) doi:10.1002/bimj.201600233. This package is a low-dependency implementation of graphical MCPs which allow mixed types of tests. It also includes power simulations and visualization of graphical MCPs.
